context.p: The StellarOne collects activities on Agent and log them in the Agent Events screen.

step.cmd: Mouse hover the Logs tab in the top navigation bar of the StellarOne web console. Click the Agent Events option.
Click the StellarProtect tab, the StellarProtect agent event logs appear.
Regarding how to search for the relevant log messages for troubleshooting or analysis. Please refer to for further procedures.

note.p: Please refer to in the Appendices for more details.
